ARABIC: فَوَقَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِ مَا مَكَرُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِـَٔالِ فِرْعَوْنَ سُوٓءُ ٱلْعَذَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So Allah safeguarded him from the evil things they plotted and a most evil torment engulfed Pharaoh's people -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So God preserved him from the evil they were planning; and a dreadful doom encompassed the people of Pharaoh:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Eventually Allah saved the person endowed with faith from all the evils of their guile, and a woeful chastisement encompassed the Pharaonites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God protected him against their evil plans and the people of the Pharaoh were struck by the most horrible torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore Allah saved him from the evils of their scheming, and an evil punishment enveloped the people of Firaun. –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, Allah saved him from the evils that they plotted (against him), while an evil torment encompassed Fir`awn's people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So Allah protected him from the evil (consequences) of what they planned, and the most evil punishment overtook Firon's people:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So God guarded him against the evil things of their devising, and there encompassed the folk of Pharaoh the evil chastisement,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So Allah warded off from him the evils which they plotted, while a dreadful doom encompassed Pharaoh's folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus, God delivered him from the evils which they plotted, and the companions of Pharaoh themselves were encompassed by a dreadful scourge;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore Allah protected him from ills which they plotted, and there surrounded the family of Fir'awn the evil of torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then Allah saved him from their evil schemes, while a terrible punishment besieged Pharaoh’s clan:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then Allah saved him from (every) ill that they plotted (against him), but the burnt of the Penalty encompassed on all sides the People of Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So Allah saved him from the evils that they plotted (against him), while an evil torment encompassed Fir'aun's (Pharaoh) people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah saved him from the evils that they devised, and an evil punishment encompassed Pharaoh's people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So God protected him from the evils of their scheming, while a terrible torment besieged Pharaoh’s clan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:45] So God shielded him from the evils of what they had plotted, against him, in the way of killing [him], and there besieged, befell, the folk of Pharaoh, his people as well as him, a dreadful chastisement, drowning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So Allah warded off from him the evils which they plotted) Allah drove them away from him when they wanted to kill him, (while a dreadful doom) a severe punishment (encompassed Pharaoh's folk) visited Pharaoh and his folk, i.e. they drowned.
